author: sirpool
title: Delegation Matching Service
description:
It is difficult in collecting enough delegates to sustain the pool operation.
And few difference from other pools when choosing a pool.
solution: Our crowdfunding-type matching platform can be used to expand the convenience and benefits for both SPOs and delegates.
experience: During six months as a SPO, I noticed some areas for improvement, such as the way to finding pools and collecting delegates.
